LanguageData.ISF_Settings_EnergyStatCacheTicks: Avg stat value cache period: {0} ticks
LanguageData.ISF_Settings_EnergyStatCacheTicksDesc: Set how long stat values are cached within the EnergyTracker on average. Shorter periods are more performance intensive.
LanguageData.ISF_Settings_ProgressShowXPMotesDesc: Toggle if certain ProgressEXPWorkers will throw motes displaying EXP gain.
